ecopedia.summary: Allows citizens write text that is displayed to other citizens.
ecopedia.section: The Text Component allows a citizen to write text that is displayed on a world object for other citizens to read.

The Text Component can be found on Signs, [Vehicles|Vehicle Component], and the [Distribution Station|Item Distribution Component].
Text can be useful for giving directions, advertising, or just writing a friendly greeting
For those familar with text markup, a variety of tags may be used to alter the size, color, and formatting of text.
